title: Android 11 bubbles and screen recording not working. Pixel 3XL stable build.
content:
My wife, and I both use Pixel 3 XL phones, and after updating to Android 11, the chat bubbles do not work for either of us, and we have all settings turned on the way they're supposed to be.
Screen recorder works for her, but has never showed up for me.
Any help would be appreciated.
